golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Alport syndrome
2. Fabry disease
3. Hepatitis B virus (HBV) infection
4. Hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection
5. Primary biliary cholangitis (PBC)
6. Primary sclerosing cholangitis (PSC)
7. Autoimmune hepatitis (AIH)
8. Chronic kidney disease (CKD)
9. Diabetes mellitus
10. Hyperthyroidism

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further evaluation and testing will be necessary to narrow down the definitive diagnosis. The presented symptoms and findings could be associated with multiple conditions, and it is essential to consider other factors such as patient history, family history, and response to treatment when establishing the final diagnosis.
